content.description:
Splitter OW turns to splitter fingers/offhands.

SUPER CLEAN & SUSTAINED
content.protection: many 4-5 and .4-1 camalot a couple runners
content.location: Splitter which shares anchors with P1 of the Mayor

content.description:
3 Pitch Offwidth corner route on the prow of the buttress. starts on the other side of the pillar which forms the first pitch of Dun Lubin' P1 is obvious OW corner 4-6" 5.11+ P2 and 3 continue up wide cracks and corners sharing some bits with DL

5.10+ rap this or DL
content.protection: all sizes with xtra 4-6 maybe a big bro or 2
content.location: Prow corner system...the 5 star corner and splitter which end at the same anchor for P1

content.description: One of Craig Leubben's favorite offwidths!  Pitch 1: One of the best offwidth pitches in the desert. Clean and classic. Hands through a small roof to a challenging 5.11 squeeze chimney. Pitch 2: Tight 5.10 squeeze chimney. Pitch 3: 5.10a Hands to fingers to top of the pillar. Pitch 4: 5.10+ Hands to offwidth. Pitch 5: 4rth class. Descent: Down climb Pitch 4 and rap the route.
content.protection: Set of BD cams with doubles on #3s and #5s, 3-4x #6s, 3x Green Bros, 4x Blue Bros. Two or three 9" Valley Giants are useful on Pitch 1.
content.location: First wide crack to the right of the main prow. One route to the right of The Mayor.

content.description: 2 pitch corner system with everything hands to OW with a little fingers and a little more sandy stone.
content.location: left side of the buttress up and left of Mayor maybe 150' ?
